about_the_game:
This digital art collection is filled with over 100+ stunning artworks from the game, promo art, and wallpapers!

Thank you for purchasing our art collection, which will help us make more and better games!

*After download, you'll find the digital artbook in your game's directory folder, accessible through -> Manage -> Browse local files.
This product contains images ONLY. It is not the actual game.

content_descriptors.notes: This artbook has adult themes and fictional characters depicted in sexual situations. All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

name: Best Elf: Art Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
